ðŸ“– Summary: FlorisBoard is an open-source keyboard for Android that prioritizes user privacy and customization. It offers features like a clipboard manager, advanced theming, extension support, and an emoji keyboard. The project is currently in early-beta and aims to be a modern and user-friendly alternative to proprietary keyboards.
